name: Perception (itch) (ascamach)
description:
A 2-player card game emulating a fighting game without the intricacies. Using a simple manga art style, players can understand the simplicities of fighting games in an easy-to-follow card style. Choose from 3 different characters and see which one fits your playstyle.

Played on: https://playingcards.io/

PCIO file available to download.
